Class Angle

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.units.Angle
public final class Angle extends Object
Immutable angle with methods that return the angle in radians or degrees.
Author:
Michael Darter

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static Angle create(Integer ang)
      Factory which handles the null case.
      Parameters:
      ang - Angle in degrees or null
      Returns:
      A new Angle or null

    • ceilRev

      public static double ceilRev(double rads)
      Return the ceiling revolution in radians.
      Parameters:
      rads - Angle in radians.
      Returns:
      The angle in radians of the next complete revolution.

    • floorRev

      public static double floorRev(double rads)
      Return the floor revolution in radians.
      Parameters:
      rads - Angle in radians.
      Returns:
      Angle in radians of the previous complete revolution.

    • toNormalizedDegs

      public static int toNormalizedDegs(double d)
      Normalize degrees to 0 - 359. See the test cases for more info.
      Parameters:
      d - Angle in degrees.
      Returns:
      Angle in degrees 0 - 359.

    • round

      Round a number

    • round

      protected static double round(double num, int p)
      Round a number to the specified precision.
      Parameters:
      p - Rounding precision, e.g. 1 for 0 digits after decimal, 10 for 1 digit after decimal etc.

      Return a new Angle rounded in degrees.
